Now two viewers of interest:

https://swsoyee.github.io/r3dmol/index.html
https://github.com/nvelden/NGLVieweR


```{r}
library(bio3d)
library(r3dmol)
```

```{r}
pdb <- read.pdb("1hsg")
```

```{r}
model <- r3dmol() %>%
  m_add_model(data = m_bio3d(pdb)) %>%
  m_set_style(style = m_style_cartoon(color = 'spectrum')) %>%
  m_zoom_to()

model
```
```{r}
model %>% m_add_style(style = c(m_style_sphere()),
                      sel = m_sel(resn = "MK1"))
```
```{r}
modes <- nma(pdb)
```
```{r}
plot(modes)
```
```{r}
x <- mktrj.nma(modes, pdb=pdb, file="m1.pdb")
```

```{r}
p <- read.pdb("m1.pdb")

r3dmol() %>%
  m_add_model(data = m_bio3d(p)) %>%
  m_add_style(style = c(m_style_sphere()))
  
```
